AlcoholExperience.History: Patrón is a brand of tequila produced in Mexico. It was founded in 1989 by John Paul DeJoria and Martin Crowley. Patrón is renowned for its high-quality, handcrafted tequilas made from 100% Weber Blue Agave, offering a smooth and distinct taste.

Taste.Description: Smooth with hints of citrus, agave, and vanilla, with a complex flavor profile.

Details.ServingSuggestions: Best enjoyed in classic cocktails like Margarita, Tequila Sunrise, or Paloma, or sipped neat or on the rocks.
Details.MixingSuggestions: Perfect for mixing in cocktails such as Margarita or Tequila Sunrise, or as a base in cocktails like Paloma or Tequila Mojito.
